Configuration.Name: ALMA_NCIP_Client
Configuration.Author: Tom McNulty, VCU Libraries
Bill Jones, IDS Project
Configuration.Description: This system level addon allows for ILLiad to communicate with Alma via NCIP protocol.

Setting.name: NCIP_Responder_URL
Setting.Description: This setting value is the address for the NCIP Responder URL. For Alma this will always be https://alma.exlibrisgroup.com/view/NCIPServlet unless you are testing on a sandbox version of Alma.

Setting.name: acceptItem_from_uniqueAgency_value
Setting.Description: This is your institutional Alma Code.

Setting.name: ApplicationProfileType
Setting.Description: Input the Resource Sharing Partner code used in Alma.

Setting.name: BorrowingAcceptItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Borrowing Transaction will be moved to if the BorrowingAcceptItem function fails.

Setting.name: BorrowingCheckInItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Borrowing Transaction will be moved to if the BorrowingCheckInItem function fails.

Setting.name: LendingCheckOutItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Lending Transaction will be moved to if the CheckOutItem function fails.

Setting.name: LendingCheckInItemFailQueue
Setting.Description: This designates the name of the queue a Lending Transaction will be moved to if the CheckInItem function fails.

Setting.name: EnablePatronBorrowingReturns
Setting.Description: When this setting is enabled, patron returns will go through ILLiad and a message is sent to Alma. When this setting is disabled, patron returns will go through ILLiad and will need to also be returned through Alma.

Setting.name: Use_Prefixes
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not you want to change prefixes of a transaction based on specific criteria (below).

Setting.name: Prefix_for_LibraryUseOnly
Setting.Description: This setting allows you to change the prefix of a transaction that is marked LibraryUseOnly Yes.

Setting.name: Prefix_for_RenewablesAllowed
Setting.Description: This setting allows you to change the prefix of a transaction that is marked RenewalsAllowed Yes.

Setting.name: Prefix_for_LibraryUseOnly_and_RenewablesAllowed
Setting.Description: This setting allows you to change the prefix of a transaction that is marked both LibraryUseOnly and RenewalsAllowed Yes.

Setting.name: checkInItem_Transaction_Prefix
Setting.Description: Default transaction prefix for the request identifier value in NCIP calls.
